title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work. Description:Color orange doesn't work.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When trying to set the color to orange in the preview section, the color does not change as expected.
EB: When setting the color to orange in the preview section, the color should change to orange.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the preview section. 2. Attempt to set the color to orange.
